formattedAddress: 383 W 31st St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 383 W 31st St, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

originalText.text: You would probably only use this Starbucks if you are taking a train at the station, but be warned that it’s a mess. I saw 3 orders have mistakes in my less than 10 min there. I ordered a frozen lemonade and was told that they were out of a syrup so it would taste the same but just be a little less sweet. The result was a drink that was so unrecognizable that I didn’t know it was mine (and they didn’t call my name either). Note to the staff: If you run out of the ingredients to make a drink, say that it is not available, do not undermine the difference in taste. I tried to get the attention of staff a few times and was ignored. When I finally got their attention, they confirmed it was the drink i ordered (look at my photos for comparison). I will definitely avoid this Starbucks in the future and go to one of the many other stores in the station.

originalText.text: Honestly hands down the best Starbucks ever. They make my order: brown sugar shaken oat milk espresso the best. The proportions of the ingredients used in my drink were perfectly balanced!! The service was amazing everyone was so sweet and patient and fast with making my drink it only took a couple minutes even with a line!!

text.text: Honestly hands down the best Starbucks ever. They make my order: brown sugar shaken oat milk espresso the best. The proportions of the ingredients used in my drink were perfectly balanced!! The service was amazing everyone was so sweet and patient and fast with making my drink it only took a couple minutes even with a line!!

originalText.text:
I'm writing specifically to compliment the barista working this morning (Precious according to the name tag).
She was really hustling: moving as quickly and efficiently as humanly possible, and with a great attitude. She also announced each drink in a voice loud enough to be very easily heard over the music (imo often played too loud to easily hear your name at this Starbucks.)
As she served up drinks, she enthusiastically wished everyone a great day, and seemed to mean it. It's nice to see someone doing their absolute best.
Just make sure: This is store 62869

originalText.text:
Loved my first experience ❤️
When we entered the store, we instantly felt comfortable and welcomed. Everyone was smiling, polite and very helpful. I ordered the everything bagel I was pleasantly surprised at how fresh it was. The environment was extremely welcoming! I'll definitely be back to see y'all. My new go-to for sure. Thank you for making it a great experience

originalText.text: The atmosphere was high energy and so friendly! The place was clean and organized for as busy a place as I’m sure it is! A guy named John waited on me and suggested a very delicious cappuccino! I will definitely be there again! Everyone was so warm and welcoming!
